```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
```

Read in data
```{r}
chla_nuts <- read_csv(here("data_clean", "clean_ybfmp_chla_nuts_20220301.csv")) %>%
  rename(Datetime_WDL = Datetime)
wq <- read_csv(here("data_clean", "clean_WQ_phys_20220210.csv")) %>%
  rename(Datetime_Access = Datetime,
         Station = StationCode)
```

Join data
```{r}
wq_all <- full_join(wq, chla_nuts, by = c("SampleCode", "Year", "Station", "Month"))
```

Look for samples that don't match up
```{r}
hasSampleID <- wq_all %>%
  filter(!is.na(SampleCode) & is.na(Datetime_Access))

notjoined <- anti_join(wq, chla_nuts, by = c("SampleCode", "Year", "Station", "Month")) %>%
  filter(Year>2008)

notjoined2 <- anti_join(chla_nuts, wq, by = c("SampleCode", "Year", "Station", "Month")) %>%
  filter(Year>2008)
```
